banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: What does a voice of the future sound like?

recommendations.blurb: More resources curated by Reeps One

recItems.blurb: Reeps One's first voice-generated sculpture was created from two lovers' voices; it was given as an engagement present, replacing the traditional diamond.
recItems.headline: "Forget engagement rings: Turn your voice into a one-of-a-kind gemstone"
recItems.label: READ_ARTICLE

recItems.blurb: Reeps One and his digital beatboxing AI "twin" perform a duet together inside the Nokia Bell Labs.
recItems.headline: "Reeps One ft. A.I. 'Second Self'"
recItems.label: WATCH

recItems.blurb: Award-winning VR piece which served as Reeps One's opener to tech and voice collaborations.
recItems.headline: "Reeps One: Does Not Exist -- VR Beatbox with 3D sound"
recItems.label: WATCH

recItems.blurb: Reeps One's virtual platform invites you to engage with various unique, vibrant digital gemstones, all of which visually represent and honor vocal expressions past and present.
recItems.headline: Voice Gems Meta-Museum
recItems.label: EXPLORE

takeAction.blurb: Learn more about Reeps One and his work with voice at the center of emerging technologies.

nodes.whoTheyAre: Harry Yeff, also known as Reeps One, is an internationally acclaimed media artist and creative technologist, utilizing an almost inhuman vocal range to drive his performative and large-scale artworks and installations.
nodes.whyListen:
Harry Yeff's eclectic work has generated a global following, rendering over 100 million views online, and recognition as a new-wave pioneer of experimental vocalism and technological experimentation. He has become a guiding lateral thinker in the world of art, voice and technology with articles and mentions in Wired, The Guardian, The Economist and more.

Yeff's multidisciplinary, new-media spectacles have earned him artist-in-residence positions at The Experiments in Art and Technology Program Bell Labs, Harvard University, ARS Electronica, Factory Berlin and Sonar Barcelona. He has exhibited internationally from the Museum of Art and Design in New York to the Tate Britain in London as well as Milan, London and Tokyo Design weeks, SXSW, Miami Art Basel, Davos 2020, United Nations Geneva and Sundance film festival.

videoData.description: Vocal artist and creative technologist Reeps One fills the room with otherworldly, genre-transcending sounds and rhythms, delivering a one-of-a-kind performance that explores the past, present and future of vocal expression.
videoData.socialDescription: Vocal artist and creative technologist Reeps One fills the room with otherworldly, genre-transcending sounds and rhythms, delivering a one-of-a-kind performance that explores the past, present and future of vocal expression.
